QuestData.Title: Release Heartrazor
QuestData.Description: The Twilight's Hammer have the alpha male of Highperch pinned down. You must head east up the ramp and release Heartrazor before the pride loses its patriarch!
QuestData.LogDescription: Release Heartrazor from all bonds restraining him.
QuestData.CompletionText: You must free Heartrazor before they cart him off to their evil base!
QuestData.RewardText: The great Heartrazor is a majestic creature. He has told me of his gratitude and fondness for you, $n.
